templateList.title: Content page
templateList.description: The content template is used to deliver long-form Website pages content.

templateList.description: An example of a single-page multi-question form.

templateList.title: Multi-page form
templateList.description: Use this template to break up large forms into multiple smaller steps to decrease cognitive load.

templateList.title: Filtering a dataset
templateList.description: Filters allows a user to refine the data they want to display in a large dataset by removing any items that do not match their criteria.

templateList.title: Selecting multiple options
templateList.description: Multi-select is a commonly used design pattern that allows users to select multiple options from a list. This pattern is used in various contexts such as search filters, form fields, and more.
